name: Say Yes to Adventure
description:
Goodbye 2021!

Thank you all for the support for the past year! This year-long  inaugural action-RPG project has also come to an end - glad I made it in time before 31st Dec 2021 :')

Controls:

Esc - pause menu

Alt + Enter - enter fullscreen mode

WASD / Arrow Keys - to move

Shift - melee attack

Spacebar - roll/interact

Q and E - toggle weapons

Ctrl - shoot

R - restart

Note: There is no audio for this game :)

PS: The YouTube walkthrough vid will be premiering at 20:22 hrs (GMT +8).

Happy Holidays!
